channel.title: Filmsupply picks | Vimeo
channel.description: Filmsupply is the global leader in cinematic footage licensing. With a roster of acclaimed filmmakers from M ss ng P eces, Biscuit, Anonymous Content, and more, our exclusive story-driven footage makes us the go-to creative partner for the world’s top brands. Experience the standard of footage licensing. Create your free account: https://www.filmsupply.com/register - Powered by RSSHub

item.title: The Future of Footage Licensing is Here
item.description:
Never sacrifice your vision when turning to stock footage again.

Representing talent from Stink, Anonymous Content, Pretty Bird, and more, we're pushing the industry far beyond what was once possible.

The future of stock footage is cinematic, story-driven, and award winning. The future of stock is Filmsupply.

License stock footage from our elite roster of filmmakers: https://flmsp.ly/ftsk

Read in-depth interviews from the most talented creatives in the advertising and creative industries: https://flmsp.ly/fsbg
item.author: Filmsupply

item.title: Butterflies | Filmsupply Films
item.description:
Reflecting on the end of her relationship leaves a young woman with a complex mix of memories and emotions.

—

Filmsupply exists to empower creative professionals by providing high quality, cinematic footage. Filmsupply Films exists to empower the film. Each film has been hand-picked by our curatorial team, selected to inspire, challenge, and empower us to not only be better creatives, but better humans.

Learn more about Filmsupply Films: https://flmsp.ly/4b3Yg1I

License footage from film: https://flmsp.ly/3QpTeTK

License high-quality, cinematic footage for your next project: www.filmsupply.com

—

Starring: Emily Eden & David Walker

item.title: Simply Be | Filmsupply Films
item.description:
Amidst the chaos and haste of daily life, our souls yearn for something free, a peace that calls from a place invitingly within reach.

—

item.title: June Bug | Filmsupply Films
item.description:
After failing an eye test, an elderly woman struggles to come to terms with the fact that she may never drive her beloved VW Beetle again.

item.title: Let This Feeling Go | Filmsupply Films
item.description:
"Let This Feeling Go" presents a short story about the need to express ourselves as we follow a young woman dealing with her desperate desires for self-expression after being bottled up.

—
